edu.nd.darts.cimon
Interface ObservableUpdate

All Known Implementing Classes:
AccelerometerService, BatteryService, BrowserHistoryService, CpuService, CpuUtilService, FileAccessService, GyroscopeService, HumidityService, InstructionCntService, KeyboardService, LightService, LinearAccelService, LocationService, MagnetometerService, MemoryService, MetricService, MMSService, NetBytesService, NetConnectedService, NetPacketsService, OrientationService, PhoneStateService, PressureService, ProximityService, ScreenService, SMSService, TemperatureService
public interface ObservableUpdate

Interface for method to update observables after addition of observer. Notify observables that a new observer has been registered. Observables should update the observable data and notify the observer accordingly.

Author:
darts
See Also:
AdminObserver

Method Summary
 void refreshObservable()
          Notify observables that a new observer has been registered.
 

Method Detail

void refreshObservable()
Notify observables that a new observer has been registered. Observables should update the observable data and notify the observer accordingly.
